name: Solar System (itch) (ACurrie26)
description:
3D Simulation of the Solar System (with the Sun and the Terrestrial Planets)

Left click a planet to have the camera follow its orbit, right click to snap the camera back to the sun.

-

- Assets by Brian Winn - 

Created by Aadyn Currie
